channel.title: 2006Remade # 1 2006 replica
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://www.speedtest.net/result/3040571007.png[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/5iuSi.gif[/img]
[b][url=http://2006remade.com]Website (must register to log in-game!)[/url][/b] This is Alpha, there will be [b]no[/b] resets! Current EXP rate: [b]2[/b][/center]
2006Remade is a complete emulation of what RuneScape once was in 2006. We feel as if there’s much more enjoyment in reliving the good ol’ “Golden Days” - WITHOUT an extra fee attached, in fact, 2006Remade charges absolutely nothing to enjoy the game! Nope, no hidden fees or ‘pay2win’ features!
Why are we so different from other remakes? We believe 2006Remade is one of the most advanced remakes, with genuine, fully-functional aspects that we all loved in 2006. We want you to get the most enjoyment out of playing as possible, which is why we’re committed to providing you the highest quality content in the RSPS market. There’s many other remakes out there, however, you won’t find one with the same amount of dedication, commitment, player-support, and loyalty as we have!
2006Remade strives to stay ahead of the competition with weekly Community events, fully community-driven updates, top-of-the line forums, and a professional staff team that are sure to assist you with any problem that might arise.
2006Remade has been in commission for several months, swiftly becoming the most popular 2006-Remake within a matter of weeks with the launch of Pre-Alpha. Alpha is only a few days away, we’ve just switched to a more professional-looking forum; We’re ready for Alpha, are you? Join and find out!
Join 2006Remade today, do yourself a favor.
[b]The Red color means the feature has not been started.[/b] [b]The Orange color means the feature has been started but not yet completed.[/b] [b]The Green color means the feature has been completed.[/b]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/2EJAV.gif[/img][b]Combat[/b]
[ul][li]PvP fully complete[/li] [li]PvN fully complete[/li] [li]X-logging (if disconnected during combat, logs out only after 60secs or death)[/li] [li]Perfect max hit formulas[/li] [li]Perfect accuracy formula[/li] [li]Every weapon special attack[/li] [li]Equipment effects (i.e. barrows)[/li] [li]Equipment requirements[/li] [li]Degradable equipment[/li] [li]Weapon poisoning[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/5zdcP.gif[/img][b]Skills[/b]
[ul][li][COLOR=orange]Agility[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Cooking[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Crafting[/COLOR][/li] [li][COLOR=green]Farming[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Firemaking[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Fishing[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Fletching[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Herblore[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Mining[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Prayer[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Runecrafting[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Slayer[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Smithing[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Thieving[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Woodcutting[/COLOR][/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/KKQ7R.png[/img][b]Quest:[/b]
[ul][li]Tutorial Island[/li] [li]Cook's Assistant[/li] [li]Doric's Quest[/li] [li]Imp Catcher[/li] [li]Rune Mysteries Quest[/li] [li]Sheep Shearer[/li] [li]Vampire Slayer[/li] [li]Witch's Potion[/li] [li]Druidic Ritual[/li] [li]Fishing Contest[/li] [li]Lost City[/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/fqb62.png[/img][b]Minigames[/b]
[ul][li][color=green]Duel Arena[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=green]Barrows[/COLOR][/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/R4MMI.png[/img][b]Music & Sounds[/b]
[ul][li]All skilling sounds[/li] [li]All combat sounds[/li] [li]Working music player and unlocking[/li] [li]Music playing in all regions[/li] [li]Music fade and volume control[/li][/ul]
[img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20080320193236/runescape/images/archive/3/37/20090906074416%21Lamp.png[/img][b]Random Events:[/b]
[ul][li]Genie[/li] [li]Drunken dwarf[/li] [li][color=green]Evil chicken[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=orange]Freaky Forester[/COLOR][/li] [li]River troll[/li] [li]Rock golem[/li] [li]Shade[/li] [li]Spirit tree[/li] [li][color=green]Zombie[/COLOR][/li] [li][color=red]More to come...[/COLOR][/li][/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/QR4Lh.png[/img][b]Miscellaneous[/b]
[ul][li][color=green]Hiscores (2006 style)[/COLOR][/li] [li]Integration[/li] [li]Skill interfaces[/li] [li]Repairing broken/degraded items[/li] [li]Treasure trails[/li] [li][color=navy]And so much more![/COLOR][/li][/ul]

item.title: 2006Remade # 1 2006 replica
item.dc:creator: @south-park south-park
item.description:
@south-park wrote:

Dear 2006Remade Players,

Unfortunately, this is the end of 2006Remade. It’s been a long and bumpy road, but after a little over a year of development, the sad end has come. No, I’m not closing 2006Remade because everyone quit, nor because of the hackings. It’s just time to move on with my life. Although I love to program and further expand my knowledge in the Java language, it’s all holding me back from my real dream; becoming a United States Marine.

Please do not ask me for the source, or anything to that nature. I will not agree to give it out or anything related to that. The server will remain up until the VPS runs out ([B]January 1, 2014[/B]). The forums will also stay up until my web-hosting runs out (I’m not sure when it ends).

I’d like to thank everyone that was apart of 2006Remade is the past year, both good and bad.

Thank you for everything.

[I][B]Mod Tom
Head of 2006Remade[/B][/I]

Requesting lock.

Read full topic

item.title: 2006Remade # 1 2006 replica
item.dc:creator: @south-park south-park
item.description:
@south-park wrote:

Updates from today:

​​- Added all the Gnome Pilots.
- Added almost all Shilo Village spawns (and added all shops).
- Added all Fishing Guild spawns (and shops).
- Report Abuse buttons, interface, moderator muting now works as it should. Reports are checked via Control Panel. 
- Fixed some stability issues. 
- Fixed a certain item selling for 100m coins, and another for 3.9m. 
​- No longer able to report admins
- Can no longer add people to your friends/ignore list if the account is not created.
- Can now cook cooked meat to get burnt meat for Witch's Potion quest (only works if you've started the quest and have not finished it).
- Added NPC spawns near the Varrock mine.
- Added NPC spawns at the Wizard Tower near Draynor Village.
- Added dialogue for NPC's at the Wizard Tower near Draynor Village.
- Fixed the text on the quest complete interface for Doric's Quest.
- Added NPC spawns at mage bank.
- Added NPC shop at bank bank.
- Added the following sounds:
  - Cow sounds
  - Bird sounds
  - Rat sounds
  - Bear sounds
  - Chicken sounds
  - Dog sounds
  - Demon sounds
  - Giant sounds
  - Ghost sounds
  - Imp sounds
  - Goblin sounds
  - Staff attacking sounds
  - Axes attacking sounds
  - 2-H attacking sounds
  - Scimitar attacking sounds
  - Halberd attacking sounds
  - Long-sword attacking sounds
  - Throwing knife attacking sounds
  - Javelin attacking sounds
  - Dagger attacking sounds
  - UN-Armed attacking sounds.

Read full topic
